titleStmt.title: Leaven, corrupting the childrens bread; or Christs caveat to beware of sectaries and their dangerous doctrines. In two sermons on Mark 8. 15. The former preached in the Cathedrall Church of Lincoln, at the lecture, on Wednesday, October 1. 1645. The latter in another auditorie. / By John Clarke, B. D. and pastor of the church of Fiskerton, neere Lincoln.
titleStmt.author: Clarke, John, d. 1658.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Macock, for Luke Fawne, and are to be sold at his shop at the sign of the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the sign of the Parrot in Pauls Church-yard.
